snippet: The Mitt Romney on display this week was looser and more relaxed, offering a counter to his reputation as a data-driven technocrat.
abstract: Political memo; Mitt Romney, appearing buoyed by his debate performance, is looser and more relaxed on campaign trail, offering a counter to his reputation as a data-driven technocrat; is showing off his softer, empathetic side.

byline.contributor: Trip Gabriel contributed reporting from Apopka, Fla.

lead_paragraph: The Mitt Romney on display this week was looser and more relaxed, offering a counter to his reputation as a data-driven technocrat.

headline.seo: Romney, After Debate Success, Shows Softer Side
headline.main: Romney, Buoyed by Debate, Shows Off His Softer Side
headline.print_headline: Romney, Buoyed by Debate’s Success, Shows Off His Softer Side
